name: Counterweight Kate
description:
Counterweight Kate  (Commodore 64 - PAL - D64 release)

One night Kate wakes up to find that all her toys have come alive.

So she dons her bike helmet and off she goes to save them all!

Bounce through 12 levels, flip the right switches, and help Kate rescue 6 of her cuddly friends.

Warning! This game is NOT easy unless you're really used to hard games. So.. now you've been warned, go have some fun  ;-)

Controls:

Fire/UP - Jump

Fire/UP while on a bouncy of object - Small bounce (you'll get the hang of it)

LEFT/RIGHT - Yup, move Kate left or right.

Loading the game:

LOAD"*",8,1

RUN
